did.unittitle: Bob Packwood letter to Barbara Vatter
did.abstract: Letter from Bob Packwood to Barbara Vatter, 15 September 1969, acknowledging Vatter's letter regarding legislation to abolish the Committee on Un-American Activities.

scopecontent.p: Letter from Bob Packwood to Barbara Vatter, 15 September 1969, acknowledging Vatter's letter regarding legislation to abolish the Committee on Un-American Activities.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open to the public.
